channel.title: Go Humble! RSS BOOKS
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle books bundles!

item.title: Star Trek Comics Megabundle
item.content:encoded: Captain the Starship Enterprise from the comfort of your own home with the Star Trek Comics Megabundle! Since 1966, Star Trek has inspired generations with bold, scifi-defining stories told across TV, film, games—and comics. Now, explore nearly 100 titles in this epic library, including Star Trek: Strange New Worlds—The Illyrian Enigma, Star Trek: Defiant, Vol. 1, Star Trek, Vol. 1: Godshock, and many more. Pay what you want for stellar comics and help support The Comic Book Legal Defense Fund with your purchase!

item.title: Return of the Leading Ladies by Image Comics
item.content:encoded: We’ve teamed up with Image Comics for the Return of the Leading Ladies Bundle—a powerhouse collection of femme-led stories like It’s Lonely at the Centre of the Earth, Paper Girls Vols. 1–6, Saga Vols. 1–10, and more. This 30+ title library doesn’t pander—it celebrates the full spectrum of the femme experience without drowning it in pink. Pay what you want for these standout comics from Image and support BINC with your purchase.

item.title: The Pentesting & Hacking Toolkit by Packt
item.description: Build real-world hacking skills and stay ahead of cyber threats
item.content:encoded: Master the art of offensive security with The Pentesting & Hacking Toolkit. This curated bundle features hands-on guides and expert resources for ethical hackers, red teamers, and aspiring pentesters. Covering everything from vulnerability discovery to exploitation and post-exploitation techniques, these books provide practical skills to identify and fix security gaps before attackers do. Perfect for all skill levels aiming to level up in cybersecurity.

item.title: Get Good with Money
item.content:encoded: Stop wasting your money—start mastering it. Learn the financial skills you need to succeed with the all-new Get Good With Money Bundle. Shift your money mindset with top ebooks like Money Hacks Handbook, Prepper's Financial Guide, Think Like a Self-Made Millionaire, and more. You won’t get rich overnight, but you’ll gain the tools to flip your financial script. Pay what you want to level up your financial literacy and help support Child’s Play Charity!

item.title: Fandom and Pop Culture Cookbooks
item.description: From the big screen to your kitchen table
item.content:encoded: Learn how to cook a wide variety of foods from your favorite shows, movies, games, and more with the all-new Pop Culture and Fandom Cookbook Bundle! Take your meals from block to plate with the Minecrafter's Cookbook. Craft food even a zombie would eat with the The Walking Dead: The Official Cookbook and Survival Guide. And ewww, David—you got the Tastes Like Schitt: The Unofficial Schitt's Creek Cookbook? Pay what you want for the most fun cookbook collection around and help support The Global FoodBanking Network with your purchase.

item.title: Roll Big or Go Home RPG Megabundle
item.content:encoded:
Gather up your party for the ultimate TTRPG adventure with the Roll Big or Go Home RPG Megabundle. This legendary 50+ title bundle is jam-packed with rulebooks, auxiliary resources, soundtracks, and more for you to enjoy. Help Aang bring elemental balance to the world in Magpie Games’ Avatar Legends: The Roleplaying Game, use your best chrome to smoke Corpos in R. Talsorian Games’ Cyberpunk RED, and roleplay as a robot in disguise in Renegade Game Studios’ Transformers Roleplaying Game. Play the best games from the best publishers within our biggest TTRPG bundle ever! Plus, a portion of your purchase helps support Extra Life.

The titles in this bundle are available through DriveThruRPG.

item.title: Numenera RPG Collection by Monte Cook Games
item.content:encoded: Explore the Ninth World with your companions in this engrossing futuristic TTRPG. Unlock the ultimate tabletop role-playing bundle for epic adventures in the world of Numenera. This massive collection from Monte Cook Games includes new rulebooks, maps, campaigns, and more—adding unrivaled value and depth to your existing library. Get everything you need to embark on an unforgettable journey, and help support the ACLU!

item.title: Clover Press: The Art of Storytelling
item.description: Curated comics + more by Clover Press
item.content:encoded: We’ve partnered with Clover Press to deliver members a lesson in the art of storytelling. Lose yourself in outstanding graphic novels and ebooks rich with narrative depth and striking visuals. Follow the mystery of Jay Gatsby in a vivid reimagining of the Roaring Twenties in The Great Gatsby, experience a modern retelling of an ancient classic in Dracula of Transylvania, and explore a cautionary tale of corporate greed in BILLI 99. Plus, your purchase helps support The Hero Initiative.

item.title: The Scarlett St. Clair Romantasy Collection
item.content:encoded: Fall in love with the hot and steamy fantasy novels of renowned romance author Scarlett St. Clair. This all-new ebook bundle features a rich mix of her best works including A Touch of Darkness, A Game of Fate, and King of Battle and Blood. Lose yourself in the love and lust of this expansive romantasy library. Plus—a portion of your purchase helps support Native Forward Scholars Fund!

item.title: Sybex Certification by Wiley
item.content:encoded: Dominate your IT certification exams with the latest Sybex prep bundle by Wiley. For over 200 years, Wiley has empowered individuals with the tools to succeed in the digital world. Their Sybex prep series offers top-tier training to help you keep your skillset current in the ever-changing IT landscape. Get study guides like CompTIA Security+ Practice Tests: Exam SY0-701, 3rd Edition, and access industry-leading resources today—plus, help support The Hidden Genius Project with your purchase!

item.title: Lilo & Stitch, Gargoyles, and More Disney Comics!
item.description: A constellation of star-studded Disney Comics
item.content:encoded: Calling all Disney fans! Step into the magical world of Disney Comics with our latest collaboration with Dynamite Entertainment. All your favorite critters, heroes, and goofballs are here to entertain fans of all ages. Dive into a vibrant library featuring 50 comics starring beloved characters like Lilo & Stitch, Gargoyles, Hercules, and more. Discover amazing page-turners based on your favorite stories—and help support First Book with every purchase.
